com.authlete.mdoc

Class DeviceAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.authlete.cbor.CBORItem
      • com.authlete.cbor.CBORPairList
        • com.authlete.mdoc.DeviceAuth

  • public class DeviceAuth
extends CBORPairList
    The DeviceAuth structure.

    For details, see ISO/IEC 18013-5:2021, 8.3.2.1.2.2 Device retrieval mdoc response.

    Definition

     DeviceAuth = {
     "deviceSignature" : DeviceSignature, //  ; "//" means or
     "deviceMac" : DeviceMac
 }
 
     DeviceMac = COSE_Mac0
 DeviceSignature = COSE_Sign1
    Since:
    1.5
    See Also:
    ISO/IEC 18013-5:2021, DeviceSigned
